title: Can pixel 4a answer phone for the blind
content:
My husband has gone blind. I bought him a pixel 4a for Christmas. His vision has diminished to the point he cannot see the screen to answer the phone. "hey google" can make calls for him. But we can't get google to answer. 
Any ideas on if/how this is possible.
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 4a (5G)
